document_data.name: ''Orb of Revenant Magic''
document_data.mainbody: An '''''orb of revenant magic''''' was a type of [[enchanted]] [[orb]] that could erase certain failures of its weirder.
document_data.Powers: ''Orbs of revenant magic'' were spellcasting [[implement]]s that enhanced the lethal effectiveness of [[arcane]] and [[psionic]] powers. In addition, if the wielder were to miss their foes with such a power, they could call upon the ''orb'' once each day to regain their spent energies.
document_data.Notable Owners: * The Ice Queen [[Iyraclea]] kept an ''orb of revenant magic'' in her [[Iyraclea's palace|tower]] on the [[Great Glacier]].{{Cite organized play/LFR/Tyranny's Bitter Frost|30}}
